title: (x) Preview Fonts - Uppen Arms {Mike F}
content:
Does anyone know the name of this font? Please The person that uses it wasn't even willing to share the name :o(   
 Thank you,   
 Linda   
 ![small preview](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124303im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28923.jpg)
author: linda32174

comments.content: I've looked through all the pixel fonts I can stand, and I couldn't find it. Where's Karen at?
Thank You For Looking.. I have been looking for a couple hours and all I have come up with is a migraine.. Hopefully Karen is still where they put her a long time ago..lol

I'm not sure this is a bitmapped font. It looks like it could just be a very small sample of a font similar to [Zavtone](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124303/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg2.html) (left side 2/3 down the page), or [Neon Stream](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124303/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg4.html) (fifth row down).   
   
If one of these isn't close enough, search with Google for Bitmapped fonts. They are everywhere.
Thank You Very Much For Your Help Mike

That's It Thank You So Much for Your Help Mike...I Really appreciate your help :o) I can't believe that the person that had the font wouldn't tell the name and then they even lied and said it was a pay font.. Thank God For Great people like you and the others at this site..
